wines.name: Caymus Vineyards
wines.note: A rich and expressive Napa Valley Cabernet Sauvignon with ripe dark fruit, cocoa, and subtle vanilla notes. Plush on the palate with polished tannins and a long, smooth finish, this is a classic, crowd-pleasing Cabernet with depth and balance.

wines.name: Inglenook
wines.note: A structured Rutherford Cabernet Sauvignon showing layers of blackcurrant, cedar, and earthy spice. Elegant and age-worthy, with firm tannins and refined acidity that highlight the classic Rutherford dust character.

wines.name: PlumpJack Estate
wines.note: An opulent Oakville Cabernet Sauvignon offering concentrated dark fruit, espresso, and sweet spice. Full-bodied and powerful, yet balanced with silky tannins and a lingering finish.

wines.name: Lail Vineyards "Blueprint"
wines.note: A polished Napa Valley Cabernet Sauvignon with vibrant blackberry, cassis, and subtle oak spice. Smooth and approachable while still offering depth and structure, making it both elegant and expressive.

wines.name: Heitz Cellar
wines.note: A classic Napa Valley Cabernet Sauvignon emphasizing balance and restraint. Notes of red and black fruit, dried herbs, and gentle oak lead into a refined, food-friendly finish.

wines.name: Dry Creek "The Mariner"
wines.note: A Bordeaux-style red blend from Dry Creek Valley with layers of dark cherry, plum, and baking spice. Medium-bodied with supple tannins and a smooth, balanced finish.

wines.name: Chappellet "Mountain Cuvée"
wines.note: A mountain-driven red blend showcasing ripe berry fruit, cocoa, and subtle herbal notes. Elegant yet powerful, with fine tannins and a lingering finish.

wines.name: Jonata "Todos"
wines.note: A complex and expressive red blend from Ballard Canyon offering dark fruit, spice, and savory undertones. Rich yet balanced, with layered texture and a long finish.
wines.region: Ballard Canyon, Santa Ynez Valley, California

wines.name: Justin "Isosceles"
wines.note: Paso Robles’ flagship Bordeaux-style blend, showing bold dark fruit, mocha, and spice. Full-bodied with structured tannins and excellent aging potential.

wines.name: Rasa "Occam’s Razor"
wines.note: A polished Columbia Valley red blend highlighting dark berry fruit, savory spice, and soft tannins. Approachable yet complex, offering excellent balance and versatility.

wines.name: Soos Creek "Ciel du Cheval Vineyard"
wines.note: A refined Red Mountain blend with dark fruit, graphite, and earthy undertones. Structured and elegant, showcasing the intensity and minerality of the site.

wines.name: Pepper Bridge "Trine"
wines.note: A powerful yet polished Walla Walla Valley red blend featuring ripe black fruit, spice, and savory complexity. Well-structured with a long, graceful finish.

wines.name: Opus One "Overture"
wines.note: A non-vintage expression of Opus One, blending multiple vintages into a seamless and elegant wine. Rich dark fruit, refined tannins, and a beautifully integrated finish.

wines.name: Opus One
wines.note: A benchmark Napa Valley red blend offering remarkable depth, precision, and balance. Layers of dark fruit, cedar, and spice unfold into a long, age-worthy finish.

wines.name: Edmeades
wines.note: A vibrant Mendocino County Zinfandel with bright red berry fruit, spice, and a hint of earth. Medium-bodied and lively with a fresh, approachable finish.

wines.name: Turley "Old Vines"
wines.note: A bold and expressive old-vine Zinfandel showing ripe blackberry, spice, and a touch of sweetness. Full-bodied with rich texture and a long, warming finish.

wines.name: Seghesio "Cortina"
wines.note: A site-driven Zinfandel from Dry Creek Valley offering concentrated dark fruit, pepper, and savory notes. Powerful yet balanced with excellent structure.

wines.name: Oakville
wines.note: A Napa Valley Zinfandel with ripe berry flavors, spice, and a smooth, rounded mouthfeel. Approachable and flavorful with a clean finish.

wines.name: Frank Family
wines.note: A polished Napa Valley Zinfandel showing ripe blackberry, vanilla, and spice. Rich and smooth with a refined, lingering finish.

wines.name: Grgich Hills
wines.note: An elegant Napa Valley Zinfandel with bright fruit, spice, and earthy complexity. Balanced and expressive, offering depth without heaviness.

wines.name: Drew
wines.note: An elegant Anderson Valley Pinot Noir showing bright red fruit, forest floor, and subtle spice. Refined and layered, with silky tannins and a long, graceful finish.

wines.name: Drew
wines.note: A site-driven Anderson Valley Pinot Noir with notes of cherry, cranberry, and earthy minerality. Balanced and expressive, offering depth with a polished structure.

wines.name: Dunham Cellars
wines.note: A bold Columbia Valley Syrah with dark berry fruit, pepper, and savory spice. Medium to full-bodied with smooth tannins and a balanced finish.

wines.name: Hartford Court "Outer Limits"
wines.note: A coastal-influenced Sonoma Coast Syrah offering intense dark fruit, olive, and cracked pepper notes. Structured and complex with excellent depth and length.

wines.name: Drew "Valenti Ranch"
wines.note: A powerful yet refined Syrah from Mendocino Ridge, showcasing dark fruit, floral notes, and savory spice. Cool-climate structure with a long, elegant finish.

wines.name: Two Hands "Gnarly Dudes"
wines.note: A bold and expressive Barossa Valley Shiraz with ripe blackberry, chocolate, and spice. Full-bodied and generous, offering rich texture and a smooth finish.

wines.name: Torbreck "Descendant"
wines.note: A powerful Barossa Valley red blend delivering intense dark fruit, spice, and earthy depth. Full-bodied and concentrated with serious structure and aging potential.

wines.name: Herman Story "Nuts and Bolts"
wines.note: A rich and expressive California Syrah with bold dark fruit, pepper, and savory complexity. Plush and layered with a long, warming finish.

wines.name: Keermont "Steepside"
wines.note: A refined Stellenbosch Syrah showing dark berry fruit, herbal notes, and subtle spice. Elegant structure with balanced acidity and a lingering finish.

wines.name: The Walls "Stanley Groovy"
wines.note: A bold Washington red blend with ripe black fruit, spice, and savory undertones. Structured and expressive, highlighting Red Mountain intensity.

wines.name: Leonetti Cellar
wines.note: A polished Walla Walla Valley Merlot offering rich dark fruit, cocoa, and subtle spice. Full-bodied yet elegant with refined tannins and excellent balance.

wines.name: Whitehall Lane
wines.note: A smooth and approachable Napa Valley Merlot with ripe plum, cherry, and soft spice notes. Medium-bodied with a polished, food-friendly finish.

wines.name: Freemark Abbey
wines.note: A classic Napa Valley Merlot offering ripe red fruit, cocoa, and subtle oak. Balanced and expressive with a smooth, lingering finish.

wines.name: Barnett Vineyard
wines.note: A mountain-grown Napa Valley Merlot with dark fruit, spice, and firm structure. Elegant yet powerful, showcasing Spring Mountain character.

wines.name: PlumpJack
wines.note: A rich and expressive Napa Valley Merlot with ripe blackberry, mocha, and spice. Full-bodied with plush texture and a long finish.

wines.name: Upchurch
wines.note: A structured Red Mountain Cabernet Sauvignon with dark fruit, graphite, and savory spice. Powerful yet balanced with excellent aging potential.

wines.name: Steele "Red Hills"
wines.note: A vibrant Lake County Cabernet Sauvignon with dark berry fruit, spice, and firm tannins. Bold and approachable with great value.

wines.name: Stags Leap Wine Cellars
wines.note: A classic Napa Valley Cabernet Sauvignon offering dark fruit, cedar, and refined tannins. Balanced and elegant with a long, polished finish.

wines.name: Martin Ray "Santa Cruz"
wines.note: A cool-climate Cabernet Sauvignon with bright black fruit, herbal notes, and fresh acidity. Lively and structured with a clean finish.

wines.name: Martin Ray "Stags Leap"
wines.note: A refined Stags Leap District Cabernet Sauvignon showcasing dark cherry, cocoa, and polished tannins. Elegant and expressive with excellent balance.
wines.region: Stags Leap District, Napa Valley, California

wines.name: Martin Ray "Diamond Mountain"
wines.note: A mountain-grown Napa Valley Cabernet Sauvignon offering dark fruit, spice, and firm structure. Powerful and age-worthy with a long finish.

wines.name: Pine Ridge
wines.note: A polished Napa Valley Cabernet Sauvignon with ripe dark fruit, subtle oak, and smooth tannins. Balanced and approachable with classic character.

wines.name: Trujillo
wines.note: A powerful Napa Valley Cabernet Sauvignon featuring dense dark fruit, spice, and firm tannins. Structured and intense with excellent depth and aging potential.

wines.name: Evening Land
wines.note: A refined Oregon Pinot Noir blending Pinot Noir and Gamay, offering bright red fruit, floral notes, and subtle earthiness. Light to medium-bodied with fresh acidity and a graceful finish.

wines.name: Roco "The Stalker"
wines.note: A lively Willamette Valley Pinot Noir with bright cherry, raspberry, and subtle spice. Approachable and expressive with soft tannins and a clean finish.

wines.name: Roco "Private Stash"
wines.note: A mature and complex Willamette Valley Pinot Noir offering layered red fruit, forest floor, and savory notes. Elegant structure with a long, refined finish.

wines.name: Ken Wright
wines.note: A classic Willamette Valley Pinot Noir showcasing bright red berries, subtle spice, and vibrant acidity. Balanced and food-friendly with a fresh finish.

wines.name: Brick House "Select"
wines.note: An expressive Ribbon Ridge Pinot Noir with dark cherry, earthy undertones, and gentle spice. Structured and elegant with excellent balance.

wines.name: Archery Summit "Arcus Vineyard"
wines.note: A powerful and refined Dundee Hills Pinot Noir offering concentrated red fruit, floral aromatics, and fine tannins. Elegant yet structured with great aging potential.

wines.name: Colene Clemens "Dopp Creek"
wines.note: A fresh and vibrant Pinot Noir from the Chehalem Mountains with bright red fruit, subtle earth, and lively acidity. Approachable and well-balanced.

wines.name: Toil Oregon
wines.note: A polished Willamette Valley Pinot Noir with ripe cherry, spice, and subtle oak. Medium-bodied with smooth tannins and a long finish.

wines.name: Eyrie Vineyards "The Eyrie"
wines.note: A benchmark Dundee Hills Pinot Noir emphasizing elegance and balance. Delicate red fruit, earth, and floral notes with a refined, lingering finish.

wines.name: Holocene "Apocrypha"
wines.note: A distinctive Willamette Valley Pinot Noir with layered red fruit, herbal nuance, and mineral-driven structure. Thoughtful and expressive with a long finish.

wines.name: Baileyana "Firepeak Vineyard"
wines.note: A smooth Central Coast Pinot Noir with ripe red fruit, light spice, and soft tannins. Approachable and versatile with a clean finish.

wines.name: Sandhi "Sta. Rita Hills"
wines.note: A coastal-influenced Pinot Noir with bright acidity, red berry fruit, and subtle savory notes. Fresh and energetic with excellent balance.

wines.name: Littorai "Sonoma Coast"
wines.note: An elegant Sonoma Coast Pinot Noir offering red fruit, earth, and coastal minerality. Refined structure with a long, nuanced finish.

wines.name: Littorai "Les Larmes"
wines.note: A focused and expressive Pinot Noir with layered red fruit, savory depth, and fine tannins. Elegant and age-worthy with great precision.

wines.name: Flowers "Sonoma Coast"
wines.note: A coastal Sonoma Pinot Noir with bright red fruit, floral aromatics, and refreshing acidity. Balanced and refined with a clean, persistent finish.

wines.name: Small Vines "TBH Vineyard"
wines.note: A concentrated yet elegant Sonoma Coast Pinot Noir with ripe cherry, spice, and fine tannins. Expressive and layered with excellent length.

wines.name: Sea Smoke "Southing"
wines.note: A powerful Sta. Rita Hills Pinot Noir with dark fruit, spice, and coastal intensity. Rich and structured with a long, expressive finish.

wines.name: Kosta Browne "Santa Rita Hills"
wines.note: A bold yet balanced Pinot Noir showing ripe red fruit, spice, and fine tannins. Rich texture balanced by bright acidity and a long finish.

wines.name: Kosta Browne "Russian River Valley"
wines.note: A plush and expressive Russian River Valley Pinot Noir with ripe berry fruit, spice, and silky texture. Rich yet polished with excellent balance.

wines.name: Drew "Faite De Mer Farm"
wines.note: A cool-climate Mendocino Ridge Pinot Noir with bright acidity, red fruit, and savory minerality. Elegant and precise with a long, fresh finish.

wines.name: Domaine de L’Arnèsgue
wines.note: A classic Southern Rhône Châteauneuf-du-Pape offering ripe red fruit, garrigue, and warm spice. Medium to full-bodied with soft tannins and a savory, balanced finish.

wines.name: Domaine du Terme "Gigondas"
wines.note: A structured and expressive Gigondas showing dark berry fruit, black pepper, and herbal complexity. Bold yet balanced with a long, earthy finish.

wines.name: Juan Gil "Blue Label"
wines.note: A powerful Spanish red blend with ripe dark fruit, spice, and smoky undertones. Full-bodied and polished with a rich, lingering finish.

wines.name: Aia Vecchia "Sor Ugo"
wines.note: A refined Super Tuscan-style blend offering dark cherry, cassis, and subtle spice. Smooth and elegant with balanced acidity and polished tannins.

wines.name: Gaja "Ca’ Marcanda Promis"
wines.note: A polished Tuscan blend with vibrant red fruit, floral aromatics, and fine tannins. Elegant and expressive with excellent balance and length.

wines.name: Caiarossa
wines.note: A mature Tuscan red blend showing layered dark fruit, leather, and savory spice. Complex and refined with a long, evolving finish.

wines.name: Château Marchand "Montagne"
wines.note: A classic Right Bank Bordeaux with ripe plum, cocoa, and soft earthiness. Medium-bodied with smooth tannins and an approachable finish.

wines.name: Château Pontet-Bellegrave "Graves de Vayres"
wines.note: An elegant Bordeaux blend with red fruit, cedar, and gentle spice. Balanced and refined with classic structure and freshness.

wines.name: Château de Pez
wines.note: A structured Saint-Estèphe with dark cassis, graphite, and firm tannins. Powerful and age-worthy with a long, savory finish.

wines.name: Château Soursans
wines.note: A classic Margaux offering floral aromatics, red berry fruit, and refined tannins. Elegant and balanced with a smooth finish.

wines.name: D’Estournel
wines.note: A Médoc blend showing dark fruit, cedar, and subtle spice. Structured yet approachable with classic Bordeaux balance.

wines.name: Château Lascombes
wines.note: A mature Margaux Grand Cru Classé offering layers of dark fruit, leather, and refined oak. Elegant, complex, and beautifully integrated.

wines.name: Château Léoville Poyferré
wines.note: A powerful and age-worthy Saint-Julien Grand Cru Classé with dense dark fruit, graphite, and refined tannins. Deeply complex with exceptional longevity.

wines.name: Elio Sandri
wines.note: A classic Langhe Nebbiolo offering bright red cherry, rose petal, and subtle earth. Fresh and structured with lively acidity and a refined finish.

wines.name: Sori Montaribaldi
wines.note: An elegant Barbaresco Nebbiolo with red fruit, floral aromatics, and gentle tannins. Refined and expressive with excellent balance.

wines.name: Marchesi di Grésy "Martinenga"
wines.note: A polished Barbaresco showcasing red berries, rose, and subtle spice. Structured yet elegant with a long, graceful finish.

wines.name: Massolino "Serralunga d’Alba"
wines.note: A focused Barbaresco-style Nebbiolo with firm structure, bright acidity, and classic red fruit. Precise and age-worthy.

wines.name: Elena Giuseppe "Ascheri"
wines.note: A refined Barolo from the Ascheri vineyard with rose, cherry, and savory earth. Balanced tannins and a long, expressive finish.

wines.name: Enzo Boglietti "Arione"
wines.note: A powerful single-vineyard Barolo offering dense red fruit, spice, and firm tannins. Structured and built for aging.

wines.name: Renato Ratti "Marcenasco"
wines.note: A classic Barolo emphasizing elegance and balance, with red cherry, rose petal, and refined tannins. Long and graceful on the finish.

wines.name: Roberto Voerzio "Fossati Case Nere" Riserva
wines.note: A profound and mature Barolo Riserva with layered dark fruit, truffle, and earthy complexity. Powerful, refined, and deeply expressive.

wines.name: Roberto Voerzio "Cerequio"
wines.note: An iconic Barolo from the Cerequio vineyard showing depth, structure, and finesse. Intense red fruit, floral notes, and exceptional length.

wines.name: Roberto Voerzio "La Serra"
wines.note: A powerful and structured Barolo with dark cherry, spice, and firm tannins. Complex and age-worthy with remarkable concentration.

wines.name: Roberto Voerzio "Brunate"
wines.note: A refined Brunate Barolo offering floral aromatics, red fruit, and polished tannins. Elegant yet powerful with a long finish.

wines.name: Roberto Voerzio "Fossati"
wines.note: A concentrated and expressive Barolo with dense fruit, spice, and firm structure. Built for long-term aging and depth.

wines.name: Paul de Albas
wines.note: A mature Ribera del Duero Tempranillo showing dark fruit, leather, and savory spice. Structured and complex with a smooth finish.

wines.name: Marqués de Riscal "Reserva"
wines.note: A classic Rioja Reserva with red fruit, vanilla, and gentle spice from oak aging. Smooth, balanced, and highly approachable.

wines.name: Izarbe "Reserva Selección"
wines.note: A refined Rioja Reserva offering red berry fruit, cedar, and earthy undertones. Balanced and elegant with a long finish.

wines.name: Izarbe "Gran Reserva"
wines.note: A mature Gran Reserva with dried red fruit, leather, and spice. Complex and smooth with fully integrated tannins.

wines.name: Dominio Pingus "Flor de Pingus"
wines.note: A powerful yet polished Ribera del Duero Tempranillo with deep dark fruit, spice, and mineral structure. Concentrated and age-worthy.
wines.region: Ribera del Duero, Castilla y León, Spain

wines.name: Caparzo "La Caduta"
wines.note: A classic Rosso di Montalcino offering bright cherry, dried herbs, and fresh acidity. Medium-bodied and approachable with a clean, savory finish.

wines.name: Badia a Coltibuono
wines.note: A traditional Chianti Classico blend highlighting red fruit, earth, and subtle spice. Balanced and food-friendly with soft tannins.

wines.name: Castello La Leccia
wines.note: A bright and expressive Chianti Classico with red cherry, floral notes, and lively acidity. Fresh and approachable with a clean finish.

wines.name: Castello La Leccia "Bruciagna"
wines.note: A structured Chianti Classico Gran Selezione offering dark cherry, spice, and firm tannins. Elegant and age-worthy with depth and balance.

wines.name: Isola delle Falcole "Vecchia Vigna"
wines.note: A concentrated Tuscan blend showing ripe red fruit, spice, and earthy complexity. Medium to full-bodied with a polished finish.

wines.name: Isola delle Falcole "Gran Selezione"
wines.note: A powerful and refined Chianti Classico Gran Selezione with layered red fruit, spice, and firm structure. Long and expressive on the finish.

wines.name: Fontodi
wines.note: A benchmark Chianti Classico offering ripe cherry, mineral notes, and refined tannins. Balanced and elegant with excellent length.

wines.name: Avignonesi "Grifi"
wines.note: A Super Tuscan blend combining Sangiovese and Cabernet Sauvignon, showing dark fruit, spice, and polished tannins. Smooth and approachable.

wines.name: Fattoria di Bacchereto "Terre a Mano"
wines.note: An artisanal Tuscan blend offering earthy red fruit, herbal nuance, and vibrant acidity. Rustic yet refined with a long finish.

wines.name: Baricci
wines.note: A fresh and vibrant Rosso di Montalcino with bright cherry, spice, and lively acidity. Approachable and food-friendly.

wines.name: Baricci
wines.note: A structured Brunello di Montalcino with dark cherry, leather, and firm tannins. Elegant and age-worthy with a long finish.

wines.name: Argiano
wines.note: A refined Brunello di Montalcino showing red fruit, dried herbs, and polished tannins. Balanced and expressive with excellent depth.

wines.name: Argiano
wines.note: A powerful Brunello di Montalcino with concentrated fruit, spice, and firm structure. Built for aging with a long, layered finish.

wines.name: Gaja "Pieve Santa Restituta"
wines.note: A polished Brunello di Montalcino offering depth, elegance, and precision. Red fruit, floral notes, and refined tannins lead to a long finish.

wines.name: Caparzo "La Casa"
wines.note: A mature Brunello di Montalcino with dried cherry, leather, and earthy complexity. Fully developed with a smooth, lingering finish.

wines.name: Fontodi "Flaccianello della Pieve"
wines.note: A legendary Super Tuscan Sangiovese offering intense dark fruit, minerality, and refined tannins. Powerful, elegant, and age-worthy.

wines.name: Fontodi "Flaccianello della Pieve"
wines.note: A bold and expressive Sangiovese with ripe fruit, spice, and exceptional structure. Rich yet balanced with a long finish.

wines.name: E. Guigal
wines.note: A classic Côtes du Rhône blend with ripe red fruit, spice, and soft tannins. Approachable and versatile with a smooth finish.

wines.name: E. Guigal "Crozes-Hermitage"
wines.note: A Northern Rhône Syrah offering dark berry fruit, pepper, and savory notes. Structured yet approachable with excellent balance.

wines.name: Domaine de la Solitude
wines.note: A classic Châteauneuf-du-Pape with ripe fruit, garrigue, and warm spice. Full-bodied yet balanced with a long, savory finish.

wines.name: Txomin Etxaniz "Getariako Hondarrabi Zuri"
wines.note: A crisp and lightly effervescent Txakolina with bright citrus, green apple, and saline minerality. Fresh, vibrant, and perfect for refreshing enjoyment.

wines.name: Domaine Roblin "Enclos de Maimbray"
wines.note: A precise and mineral-driven Sancerre with citrus zest, white flowers, and flinty undertones. Elegant and refreshing with a clean finish.

wines.name: Jean-Claude Dagueneau "Domaine des Berthiers"
wines.note: A refined Pouilly-Fumé offering citrus, stone fruit, and pronounced minerality. Structured and expressive with depth and finesse.

wines.name: Château La Louvière
wines.note: A classic Pessac-Léognan Blanc with layered stone fruit, citrus, and subtle oak. Rich yet balanced with excellent texture.

wines.name: Jean-Charles
wines.note: A fresh and expressive Burgundy Chardonnay with citrus, apple, and gentle minerality. Balanced and food-friendly.

wines.name: Marcel Servin
wines.note: A classic Chablis with bright citrus, green apple, and chalky minerality. Crisp, clean, and refreshing.

wines.name: Guy Robin "Montmains" Premier Cru
wines.note: A focused Chablis Premier Cru offering layered citrus, stone fruit, and saline minerality. Elegant and structured with length.

wines.name: Samuel Billaud
wines.note: A refined Chablis with vibrant acidity, citrus notes, and pronounced minerality. Clean, precise, and expressive.

wines.name: Cinco Islas
wines.note: A lively Albariño with bright citrus, stone fruit, and coastal salinity. Fresh and aromatic with a crisp finish.

wines.name: Romanelli "Le Tese"
wines.note: A delicate and aromatic Trebbiano Spoletino offering floral notes, citrus, and fresh acidity. Elegant and refreshing.

wines.name: Domaine des Sables Verts
wines.note: A bright and mineral-driven Saumur Blanc with citrus, green apple, and lively acidity. Clean and refreshing.

wines.name: Pieropan "Calvarino"
wines.note: A classic Soave Classico with stone fruit, almond, and volcanic minerality. Elegant, textured, and expressive.

wines.name: Marenco "Scrapona"
wines.note: A lightly sweet and aromatic Moscato d’Asti with peach, orange blossom, and gentle fizz. Bright and refreshing.

wines.name: Meyer-Fonné "Pfœller"
wines.note: A refined Alsace Riesling with citrus, stone fruit, and mineral depth. Dry, focused, and age-worthy.

wines.name: Rolly Gassmann "Pflanzenreben de Rorschwihr"
wines.note: A mature Alsace Riesling showing honeyed citrus, petrol notes, and deep minerality. Complex and beautifully evolved.

wines.name: Merry Edwards
wines.note: A vibrant Russian River Valley Sauvignon Blanc with citrus, tropical fruit, and fresh acidity. Polished and expressive.

wines.name: DeLille "Chaleur Blanc"
wines.note: A Bordeaux-style white blend with citrus, stone fruit, and subtle oak. Rich yet balanced with excellent texture.

wines.name: Upchurch "Southwest Facing"
wines.note: A structured and expressive Yakima Valley Sauvignon Blanc with citrus, herbs, and mineral depth. Balanced and refined.

wines.name: Gramercy Cellars
wines.note: A crisp and refreshing Picpoul with bright citrus, saline notes, and lively acidity. Clean and thirst-quenching.

wines.name: Archery Summit "Vireton"
wines.note: A fresh and aromatic Pinot Gris with pear, citrus, and floral notes. Light-bodied and easy-drinking.

wines.name: Stift Klosterneuburg "Grüner Veltliner Brut"
wines.note: A crisp and refreshing Austrian sparkling wine made from Grüner Veltliner. Bright citrus, green apple, and lively acidity make this an easy, crowd-pleasing sparkler.

wines.name: Le Brun de Neuville "Extra Blanc" Blanc de Blancs
wines.note: A refined Blanc de Blancs Champagne offering crisp citrus, white flowers, and chalky minerality. Elegant and precise with a long, clean finish.

wines.name: Veuve Clicquot "Yellow Label"
wines.note: A classic, full-bodied Champagne with ripe apple, brioche, and subtle toast. Balanced and versatile, ideal for celebrations or pairing with food.

wines.name: André Clouet "Grande Réserve"
wines.note: A rich and expressive Champagne driven by Pinot Noir, showing red apple, brioche, and mineral depth. Bold yet balanced with great character.

wines.name: Taittinger "Brut La Française"
wines.note: An elegant and refined Champagne with citrus, stone fruit, and delicate bubbles. Fresh, balanced, and beautifully polished.

wines.name: Perrier-Jouët "Grand Brut"
wines.note: A floral and graceful Champagne offering notes of pear, citrus, and light brioche. Smooth and approachable with a clean finish.

wines.name: Moët & Chandon "Impérial"
wines.note: A lively and generous Champagne with green apple, citrus, and subtle toast. Fresh, balanced, and instantly recognizable.

wines.name: Dom Pérignon
wines.note: A legendary vintage Champagne offering remarkable depth, finesse, and complexity. Layered citrus, stone fruit, and brioche with a long, elegant finish.

wines.name: André Clouet "Brut Rosé"
wines.note: A vibrant Rosé Champagne with red berry fruit, citrus zest, and fine bubbles. Fresh and expressive with a crisp finish.

wines.name: Marenco "Pineto" Brachetto d’Acqui
wines.note: A lightly sparkling, aromatic red wine with strawberry, rose petals, and gentle sweetness. Served in a 375 mL bottle and perfect for dessert or sipping.

wines.name: Jansz "Premium Rosé" Brut
wines.note: A crisp and refreshing Tasmanian sparkling rosé with red berry fruit, citrus, and bright acidity. Clean, lively, and easy-drinking.

wines.name: Dusted Valley 'Olsen Vineyard' Chardonnay
wines.note: A balanced and expressive Chardonnay from Washington’s Columbia Valley, offering clean orchard fruit layered with subtle oak influence. Fresh acidity keeps the wine lively while notes of apple, pear, and a gentle creaminess provide depth and structure. Elegant and food-friendly.

wines.name: Evening Land 'Seven Springs' Chardonnay
wines.note: A vibrant Willamette Valley Chardonnay highlighting precision and minerality. Bright citrus, green apple, and subtle floral notes are supported by crisp acidity and restrained oak. Refined and expressive of the Eola-Amity Hills terroir.

wines.name: Evening Land 'Summum' Chardonnay
wines.note: A powerful yet precise expression of Chardonnay, offering layered complexity and depth. Ripe stone fruit, citrus oil, and savory mineral notes are woven together with well-integrated oak and a long, structured finish. A serious, age-worthy wine.

wines.name: Evening Land 'La Source' Chardonnay
wines.note: Elegant and deeply layered, this Chardonnay shows remarkable balance between richness and restraint. Notes of citrus, stone fruit, and subtle savory elements are framed by bright acidity and a mineral-driven finish.

wines.name: Sandhi 'Rinconada' Chardonnay
wines.note: A coastal California Chardonnay marked by tension and freshness. Bright citrus, saline minerality, and restrained oak define this focused wine, with excellent acidity and a clean, lingering finish.

wines.name: La Jota 'W.S. Keyes Vineyard' Chardonnay
wines.note: A richly textured yet structured Chardonnay from Howell Mountain. Concentrated orchard fruit, subtle spice, and well-integrated oak are balanced by vibrant acidity, creating a powerful and polished expression.

wines.name: Suzor 'The Sunflower' Chardonnay
wines.note: A bright and approachable Oregon Chardonnay with fresh apple, pear, and citrus notes. Light oak influence and crisp acidity make this an easy-drinking yet thoughtfully made wine.

wines.name: Grgich Hills Chardonnay
wines.note: A classic Napa Valley Chardonnay offering balance and finesse. Notes of apple, citrus, and subtle vanilla are supported by refreshing acidity and a clean, polished finish.

wines.name: Failla 'Sonoma Coast' Chardonnay
wines.note: Cool-climate Chardonnay with bright acidity and coastal influence. Citrus, green apple, and subtle mineral notes combine with restrained oak for a fresh, expressive profile.

wines.name: Kistler 'Les Noisetiers' Chardonnay
wines.note: A signature Kistler Chardonnay showcasing richness balanced by precision. Ripe stone fruit, toasted hazelnut, and creamy texture are lifted by vibrant acidity and a long, elegant finish.

wines.name: Pahlmeyer 'Jayson' Chardonnay
wines.note: Luxurious and expressive, this Napa Valley Chardonnay offers ripe orchard fruit, subtle spice, and creamy texture. Balanced by bright acidity, it delivers both power and finesse.

wines.name: LTL Grenache Rosé
wines.note: A fresh and lively Grenache Rosé with bright red berry fruit and refreshing acidity. Clean, crisp, and versatile, making it an excellent choice for warm days or light fare.

wines.name: Tiberio 'Cerasuolo d'Abruzzo' Montepulciano
wines.note: A classic Italian Cerasuolo offering vibrant cherry fruit, floral notes, and crisp acidity. Structured yet refreshing, with a distinctive rosé style rooted in tradition.

wines.name: Domaine Mondange 'Laudria Rosé' Sciaccarellu
wines.note: A delicate and aromatic Corsican rosé with notes of red fruit, herbs, and subtle spice. Bright acidity and a clean finish make this an elegant and refreshing option.

wines.name: La Spinetta 'Il Rosé di Casanova' Sangiovese Blend
wines.note: A refined Tuscan rosé blending freshness with structure. Notes of strawberry, citrus, and subtle herbal tones are balanced by bright acidity and a dry, elegant finish.

wines.name: Fattoria di Bacchereto 'Terre a Mano' Sassocarlo Bianco
wines.note: An expressive orange wine offering texture and complexity. Aromatic notes of stone fruit, dried herbs, and subtle tannin structure create a distinctive and food-driven experience.

wines.name: Stephane Aviron 'Fleurie Vieilles Vignes' Gamay
wines.note: An elegant and lifted Gamay from Fleurie, showing bright red berry fruit, subtle floral notes, and gentle spice. Light-bodied and silky with fresh acidity, making it a classic and approachable expression of Beaujolais.

wines.name: Domaine Fagoletti 'Le Janin' Morgon Gamay
wines.note: A more structured style of Gamay from Morgon, offering dark cherry, earthy undertones, and a savory edge. Balanced acidity and soft tannins give this wine depth while remaining fresh and food-friendly.

wines.name: Enzo Boglietti Barbera d'Alba
wines.note: A bright and vibrant Barbera with juicy red fruit, lively acidity, and a clean finish. Approachable and versatile, showcasing the freshness and charm of Alba-grown Barbera.

wines.name: Roberto Voerzio 'Il Cerreto' Barbera d'Alba
wines.note: A refined and expressive Barbera offering concentrated dark fruit, subtle spice, and polished texture. Rich yet balanced, with excellent structure and a long, elegant finish.

wines.name: Voerzio Alberto Barbera d'Alba
wines.note: A powerful and focused Barbera displaying ripe red and black fruit, vibrant acidity, and fine tannin structure. Crafted with precision, offering depth and age-worthy potential.

wines.name: Masi 'Serego Alighieri Vaio Armaron' Amarone della Valpolicella
wines.note: A rich and complex Amarone with layers of dried cherry, dark chocolate, spice, and savory notes. Full-bodied and structured with a long, warming finish, ideal for slow sipping or hearty dishes.

wines.name: Masi 'Campolongo di Torbe Classico' Amarone della Valpolicella
wines.note: An intense and age-worthy Amarone showcasing dried fruit, spice, and earthy complexity. Full-bodied with firm structure and a lingering finish, highlighting the depth and tradition of Valpolicella Classico.

wines.name: Comando G 'La Bruja Avería' Garnacha
wines.note: A fresh and expressive Garnacha from high-elevation vineyards, offering red berry fruit, herbal notes, and vibrant acidity. Elegant and mineral-driven with a light-bodied, refined profile.

wines.name: Coster dels Olivers Garnacha Cabernet Sauvignon
wines.note: A balanced Spanish blend combining Garnacha’s freshness with Cabernet Sauvignon’s structure. Ripe red fruit, subtle spice, and a smooth finish make this an approachable and versatile red.

wines.name: Rolly Gassmann Pinot Noir
wines.note: A fresh and aromatic Pinot Noir with red berry fruit, gentle earthiness, and bright acidity. Light-bodied and elegant, offering excellent balance and easy drinkability.

wines.name: Capitan-Gagnerot Savigny-lès-Beaune 1er Cru 'Les Charnières'
wines.note: A refined Premier Cru Pinot Noir showing red cherry, subtle spice, and earthy undertones. Balanced structure and lively acidity highlight the elegance of Savigny-lès-Beaune.

wines.name: Domaine du Prieuré Savigny-lès-Beaune 1er Cru 'Les Hauts Jarrons'
wines.note: An expressive Premier Cru Pinot Noir with layers of red fruit, earth, and subtle savory notes. Well-structured yet approachable, offering classic Burgundy elegance.

wines.name: Alain Gras 'Très Vieilles Vignes' Auxey-Duresses Pinot Noir
wines.note: A beautifully mature Pinot Noir with depth and finesse. Notes of dried cherry, forest floor, and gentle spice are balanced by soft tannins and a long, elegant finish.
wines.region: Auxey-Duresses, Côte de Beaune, Burgundy, France

wines.name: La Pousse d'Or 'Clos de Tavannes' Santenay 1er Cru
wines.note: A polished and expressive Premier Cru Pinot Noir with ripe red fruit, floral notes, and refined structure. Elegant and age-worthy with a long, mineral-driven finish.
wines.region: Santenay, Côte de Beaune, Burgundy, France

wines.name: Domaine de Courcel 'Pommard Le Grand Clos Epenots' Premier Cru
wines.note: A powerful and structured Pommard showcasing dark fruit, earthy depth, and firm tannins. Classic and age-worthy, with complexity unfolding over time.
wines.region: Pommard, Côte de Beaune, Burgundy, France

wines.name: Domaine de Courcel 'Pommard Le Grand Clos Epenots' Premier Cru
wines.note: A refined yet muscular expression of Pommard, offering concentrated dark fruit, savory notes, and structured tannins. Built for aging with impressive depth and balance.
wines.region: Pommard, Côte de Beaune, Burgundy, France
